bike.description: A6-SL alloy, custom-butted, semi-integrated tapered headset w/ 1.5" lower bearing, hydroformed top and down tube, water bottle mount

components.description: A6-SL alloy, custom-butted w/ sealed bearing pivots, low-leverage suspended rockers, FSR 140mm travel, 142mm dropout, post-style disc mount and replaceable hanger
Fox 32 FLOAT Performance CTD w/ 15mm thru axle, tapered alloy steerer, 140mm travel
Sun Charger Expert 15mm thru front / 142x12 rear, 6-bolt
Schwalbe Nobby Nic, 26" x 2.35" folding, 67 tpi
Oval M600, alloy riser bar, 9° sweep, 31.8mm diameter, 680mm wide, 15mm rise
Oval M613, 3D-forged alloy, 31.8mm clamp diameter, 6° rise
Oval M600 w/ hollow CrMo rails
Oval M600, alloy double-bolt micro-adjust, 31.6mm x 350mm
